action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on user appearance settings, including landing page and inbox cleanup.

action_item: Users & Roles - Upgrade patient search functionality by unchecking the legacy search box.
notes: This allows for more precise searches combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process in the settings tab.

action_item: Security - Change eSignature ID for additional security layer.
notes: Requires validation of current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update visual signature in the system.
notes: Requires validation of eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Decide which sections of a patient's chart to include and their order.
